metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3625 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been classified ascritical. This affects the function devlink_param_set/devlink_param_get ofthe file net/core/devlink.c of the component IPsec. The manipulation leadsto use after free. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.The identifier VDB-211929 was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
